metadata.title: CVE-2020-21677 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow in the sixel_encoder_output_without_macro function in encoder.c of Libsixel 1.8.4 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via converting a crafted PNG file into Sixel format.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
